description.value:
One with the powers of darkness, you learn to abandon your body. When you use this ability, you become a swarm of tiny, batlike shadows. In this swarm-like battle form, you gain the following characteristics and traits.

  • Your size changes to Huge.
  • You gain the Swarming Bites 1 ability that deals @Damage[10d10[void]] damage to any creature sharing your space (@Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.spellDC.value)|basic:true]).
  • You gain a fly speed of 40 feet and can pass through any openings a tiny creature could pass through.
  • You have the swarm trait and gain resistance 10 to all physical damage and weakness 5 to area and splash damage.
  • AC = 22 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • You can't speak, cast spells, use manipulate actions requiring your hands, activate your magic items, or make any of your Strikes with your normal body
